title: ECA Configuration
description: Configuration schema for ECA (Editor Code Assistant). See https://eca.dev/config/introduction for full documentation.
markdownDescription: Configuration schema for ECA (Editor Code Assistant). See https://eca.dev/config/introduction for full documentation.

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor validation support.
$schema.markdownDescription: JSON Schema reference for editor validation support.

providers.description: LLM provider configurations. Each key is the provider name.
providers.markdownDescription: LLM provider configurations. Each key is the provider name.

defaultModel.description: Default model in format 'provider/model'. When null, ECA decides the default model.
defaultModel.markdownDescription: Default model in format 'provider/model'. When null, ECA decides the default model.

defaultAgent.description: The default agent to use for new chats.
defaultAgent.markdownDescription: The default agent to use for new chats.

agent.description: Named agent configurations for different workflows.
agent.markdownDescription: Named agent configurations for different workflows.

defaultBehavior.description: Deprecated: use 'defaultAgent' instead. Backward compatible alias.
defaultBehavior.markdownDescription: Deprecated: use 'defaultAgent' instead. Backward compatible alias.

behavior.description: Deprecated: use 'agent' instead. Backward compatible alias.
behavior.markdownDescription: Deprecated: use 'agent' instead. Backward compatible alias.

hooks.description: Shell actions that run before or after specific events.
hooks.markdownDescription: Shell actions that run before or after specific events.

rules.description: Rules are contexts passed to the LLM during a prompt, useful to tune prompts or LLM responses.
rules.markdownDescription: Rules are contexts passed to the LLM during a prompt, useful to tune prompts or LLM responses.

path.description: Path to a rule file (relative to workspace root or absolute).
path.markdownDescription: Path to a rule file (relative to workspace root or absolute).

enabledSkills.description: List of regex patterns matching skill names to enable. Defaults to all skills enabled.
enabledSkills.markdownDescription: List of regex patterns matching skill names to enable. Defaults to all skills enabled.

disabledTools.description: List of tool names to disable globally.
disabledTools.markdownDescription: List of tool names to disable globally.

path.description: Path to a command prompt markdown file.
path.markdownDescription: Path to a command prompt markdown file.

customTools.description: User-defined command-line tools the LLM can use.
customTools.markdownDescription: User-defined command-line tools the LLM can use.

mcpTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for MCP server operations.
mcpTimeoutSeconds.markdownDescription: Timeout in seconds for MCP server operations.

lspTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for LSP operations.
lspTimeoutSeconds.markdownDescription: Timeout in seconds for LSP operations.

welcomeMessage.description: Custom welcome message shown when ECA starts.
welcomeMessage.markdownDescription: Custom welcome message shown when ECA starts.

autoCompactPercentage.description: Context window usage percentage at which auto-compact triggers.
autoCompactPercentage.markdownDescription: Context window usage percentage at which auto-compact triggers.

type.description: Type of ignore file to use.
type.markdownDescription: Type of ignore file to use.

repoMap.description: Repository map configuration for context building.
repoMap.markdownDescription: Repository map configuration for context building.

maxTotalEntries.description: Maximum total entries in the repo map.
maxTotalEntries.markdownDescription: Maximum total entries in the repo map.

maxEntriesPerDir.description: Maximum entries per directory in the repo map.
maxEntriesPerDir.markdownDescription: Maximum entries per directory in the repo map.

model.description: Model to use for inline completions.
model.markdownDescription: Model to use for inline completions.

model.description: Model to use for rewrites. Defaults to the same model selection as chat.
model.markdownDescription: Model to use for rewrites. Defaults to the same model selection as chat.

otlp.description: OpenTelemetry OTLP collector configuration. Keys follow otlp auto-configure settings.
otlp.markdownDescription: OpenTelemetry OTLP collector configuration. Keys follow otlp auto-configure settings.

netrcFile.description: Path to a custom netrc credential file. When null, searches ~/.netrc or ~/_netrc.
netrcFile.markdownDescription: Path to a custom netrc credential file. When null, searches ~/.netrc or ~/_netrc.

title.description: Whether to automatically generate a title for new chats.
title.markdownDescription: Whether to automatically generate a title for new chats.

api.description: The API protocol to use for this provider.
api.markdownDescription: The API protocol to use for this provider.

fetchModels.description: Whether to fetch available models from the provider's API.
fetchModels.markdownDescription: Whether to fetch available models from the provider's API.

url.description: Base URL for the provider's API. Supports dynamic strings like ${env:VAR}.
url.markdownDescription: Base URL for the provider's API. Supports dynamic strings like ${env:VAR}.

key.description: API key for authentication. Supports dynamic strings like ${env:MY_API_KEY}.
key.markdownDescription: API key for authentication. Supports dynamic strings like ${env:MY_API_KEY}.

keyRc.description: Credential file lookup in format [login@]machine[:port] for netrc-based authentication.
keyRc.markdownDescription: Credential file lookup in format [login@]machine[:port] for netrc-based authentication.

completionUrlRelativePath.description: Custom relative URL path for completion requests.
completionUrlRelativePath.markdownDescription: Custom relative URL path for completion requests.

thinkTagStart.description: Custom start tag for thinking/reasoning blocks in model responses.
thinkTagStart.markdownDescription: Custom start tag for thinking/reasoning blocks in model responses.

thinkTagEnd.description: Custom end tag for thinking/reasoning blocks in model responses.
thinkTagEnd.markdownDescription: Custom end tag for thinking/reasoning blocks in model responses.

models.description: Available models for this provider. Each key is the model alias.
models.markdownDescription: Available models for this provider. Each key is the model alias.

modelName.description: The actual model identifier sent to the API, if different from the alias key.
modelName.markdownDescription: The actual model identifier sent to the API, if different from the alias key.

extraPayload.description: Additional fields to include in the API request payload.
extraPayload.markdownDescription: Additional fields to include in the API request payload.

extraHeaders.description: Additional HTTP headers to include in API requests.
extraHeaders.markdownDescription: Additional HTTP headers to include in API requests.

reasoningHistory.description: How to handle reasoning/thinking history in conversation context.
reasoningHistory.markdownDescription: How to handle reasoning/thinking history in conversation context.

mode.description: Agent mode. 'primary' for standalone agents, 'subagent' for agent-spawnable agents.
mode.markdownDescription: Agent mode. 'primary' for standalone agents, 'subagent' for agent-spawnable agents.

description.description: Description of this agent's purpose. Required for subagents — shown to the LLM so it knows when to spawn this agent. Supports dynamic strings like ${file:path} and ${classpath:path}.
description.markdownDescription: Description of this agent's purpose. Required for subagents — shown to the LLM so it knows when to spawn this agent. Supports dynamic strings like `${file:path}` and `${classpath:path}`.

systemPrompt.description: System prompt for this agent. Overrides the default system prompt. Supports dynamic strings like ${file:path} and ${classpath:path}.
systemPrompt.markdownDescription: System prompt for this agent. Overrides the default system prompt. Supports dynamic strings like `${file:path}` and `${classpath:path}`.

maxSteps.description: Maximum number of tool-call steps before the agent is halted. Useful for limiting subagent execution.
maxSteps.markdownDescription: Maximum number of tool-call steps before the agent is halted. Useful for limiting subagent execution.

defaultModel.description: Default model for this agent, overriding the global default.
defaultModel.markdownDescription: Default model for this agent, overriding the global default.

disabledTools.description: Tools to disable for this agent.
disabledTools.markdownDescription: Tools to disable for this agent.

enabledSkills.description: List of regex patterns matching skill names to enable for this agent.
enabledSkills.markdownDescription: List of regex patterns matching skill names to enable for this agent.

autoCompactPercentage.description: Context window usage percentage at which auto-compact triggers for this agent.
autoCompactPercentage.markdownDescription: Context window usage percentage at which auto-compact triggers for this agent.

hook.description: A hook configuration for running shell actions on events.
hook.markdownDescription: A hook configuration for running shell actions on events.

type.description: The event type that triggers this hook.
type.markdownDescription: The event type that triggers this hook.

matcher.description: Regex pattern for matching server__tool-name. Only for *ToolCall hook types.
matcher.markdownDescription: Regex pattern for matching server__tool-name. Only for *ToolCall hook types.

visible.description: Whether to show hook execution in chat.
visible.markdownDescription: Whether to show hook execution in chat.

runOnError.description: For postToolCall hooks, whether to run even if the tool errored.
runOnError.markdownDescription: For postToolCall hooks, whether to run even if the tool errored.

actions.description: List of actions to execute when the hook triggers.
actions.markdownDescription: List of actions to execute when the hook triggers.

hookAction.description: A shell action executed by a hook.
hookAction.markdownDescription: A shell action executed by a hook.

file.description: Path to a shell script file to execute.
file.markdownDescription: Path to a shell script file to execute.

timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for this action.
timeout.markdownDescription: Timeout in milliseconds for this action.

description.description: Description of what the tool does. Used by the LLM to decide when to use it.
description.markdownDescription: Description of what the tool does. Used by the LLM to decide when to use it.

toolCallConfig.description: Tool call configuration including approval rules and tool-specific settings.
toolCallConfig.markdownDescription: Tool call configuration including approval rules and tool-specific settings.

maxLines.description: Maximum number of lines returned by read_file.
maxLines.markdownDescription: Maximum number of lines returned by read_file.

summaryMaxLength.description: Maximum length of shell command summary.
summaryMaxLength.markdownDescription: Maximum length of shell command summary.

outputTruncation.description: Output truncation settings for tool results.
outputTruncation.markdownDescription: Output truncation settings for tool results.

lines.description: Maximum number of lines in tool output.
lines.markdownDescription: Maximum number of lines in tool output.

sizeKb.description: Maximum size in kilobytes for tool output.
sizeKb.markdownDescription: Maximum size in kilobytes for tool output.

byDefault.description: Default approval mode for tools not explicitly configured.
byDefault.markdownDescription: Default approval mode for tools not explicitly configured.

allow.description: Tools that are automatically allowed. Key is tool or server name.
allow.markdownDescription: Tools that are automatically allowed. Key is tool or server name.

ask.description: Tools that require user approval. Key is tool or server name.
ask.markdownDescription: Tools that require user approval. Key is tool or server name.

deny.description: Tools that are denied. Key is tool or server name.
deny.markdownDescription: Tools that are denied. Key is tool or server name.

approvalMatcher.description: Matcher configuration for a tool approval rule.
approvalMatcher.markdownDescription: Matcher configuration for a tool approval rule.

argsMatchers.description: Map of argument name to list of Java regex patterns to match against.
argsMatchers.markdownDescription: Map of argument name to list of Java regex patterns to match against.

mcpServer.description: MCP server configuration. Use 'url' for remote HTTP servers or 'command' for stdio servers.
mcpServer.markdownDescription: MCP server configuration. Use 'url' for remote HTTP servers or 'command' for stdio servers.

url.description: URL for remote HTTP-streamable or SSE MCP servers.
url.markdownDescription: URL for remote HTTP-streamable or SSE MCP servers.

command.description: Command to launch a stdio MCP server.
command.markdownDescription: Command to launch a stdio MCP server.

args.description: Arguments for the stdio MCP server command.
args.markdownDescription: Arguments for the stdio MCP server command.

env.description: Environment variables to set for the MCP server process.
env.markdownDescription: Environment variables to set for the MCP server process.

disabled.description: Whether this MCP server is disabled.
disabled.markdownDescription: Whether this MCP server is disabled.

prompts.description: Custom prompt configurations. Values support dynamic strings like ${file:path} and ${classpath:path}.
prompts.markdownDescription: Custom prompt configurations. Values support dynamic strings like ${file:path} and ${classpath:path}.

tools.description: Custom descriptions for specific tools. Key is the tool name.
tools.markdownDescription: Custom descriptions for specific tools. Key is the tool name.
